owun punuruththapanaya wi sitinawa, ee nisa owunta samajagathawima sandaha awasthawak salasa denna kiyala, ee nisa me prashnaya pilibandawa mama nithipathithumath adhikarana kshethrayath samanga katha karala aluth kramawedayak sakas kirimata balaporoththu wenawa kabinat mandalaye anumathiya athiwa, dirghakalinawa honda kal kriyawen hitapu eheth aparadha wala swabhawaya anuwa, wisheshayenma pathalaya, sthri dushanaya, sanwidhanathmaka minimarum, ee ayata nemeyi eyin paribhahirawa dirghakalayak bandhanagara gathawela honda kal kriyawen inna aya innawa, hondata bana daham igenagena, shila wyaparawalata sambandhawela, wishala washayen punaruththapanaya wechchi kandayam innawa.
